topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack(R) 1.1: Changing a User Password

body.p: As an admin, you can change the password for a user, as needed. You do not need to know the current password in order to assign a new password.

section.title: Change a Password

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Helion Dashboard.
Click the Users link on the Admin dashboard Identity panel.
In the Users screen, for the user you want to modify, click Edit.
In the Update User screen, enter a new password in the Password field and re-enter the password in the Confirm Password field to confirm.

section.p: You must relay the new password information to the user in a secure manner under the rules of your organization.
